About

Hi, my name is Ender. I am from Unye, Ordu, Turkey. After lived in Istanbul in 15 years, I relocated my hometown. I have been working in software industriy since 2011. I worked in lot of startups as a software engineer. I worked in Paraşüt as a software engineer between 2018-2020, after january of 2021 I have been going on working as a software development manager in the same company.

I like developing web applications especially but I try to contribute different open source projects on Github. I lead a local community which is called Ruby Turkey since 2014. You can reach more information about me from my Linkedin and you can follow me on Github and Twitter.

I have been making a podcast called Uretim Bandi:Teknik. It is about technology and software development. It's mostly in Turkish but I also have been recording english episodes.

Except this blog, I write something about life and my experiences mostly in Turkish in my Medium blog.
